description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game is based on information about secret military pilot test. Most information about this test has been collected from uncovered documents and heared from pilots. Our intention is to provide you possibility to check your perception, memory, reflex and challenge you and your skills to compete with real pilots. Can you pass the test and be a military jet pilot ? Good Luck !
